statements: SELECT * FROM energy_supply_chain_data;
SELECT energy_source, quantity FROM energy_supply_chain_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT receiver, supplier FROM energy_supply_chain_data WHERE quantity > 1000;
SELECT id, energy_source, quantity FROM energy_supply_chain_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT energy_source, receiver, supplier FROM energy_supply_chain_data WHERE energy_source = 'Solar' AND supplier = 'Company A';
SELECT * FROM energy_supply_chain_data WHERE energy_source = 'wind' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, energy_source, supplier, receiver FROM energy_supply_chain_data WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, energy_source, supplier, receiver, quantity FROM energy_supply_chain_data WHERE supplier = 'Solar Power Inc.'
SELECT * FROM energy_supply_chain_data WHERE receiver = 'Big Energy Co.' AND quantity BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT energy_source, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM energy_supply_chain_data GROUP BY energy_source HAVING total_quantity > 1000
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption WHERE device_id = 5;
SELECT timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT block_id, block_hash FROM blockchain_records WHERE prev_block_hash IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT device_id FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, SUM(energy_consumed) FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY device_id HAVING SUM(energy_consumed) > 100;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_records WHERE block_hash LIKE '%abc%' AND prev_block_hash IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain_records ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM energy_producers;
SELECT name, location, energy_type FROM energy_producers WHERE production_capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, demand, energy_type FROM energy_consumers WHERE demand < 500;
SELECT producer_id, consumer_id, energy_amount, transaction_date FROM energy_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_producers;
SELECT name, location, energy_type FROM energy_consumers WHERE demand > 100;
SELECT producer_id, consumer_id, energy_amount FROM energy_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, production_capacity FROM energy_producers WHERE energy_type = 'Solar' OR energy_type = 'Wind' LIMIT 3;

SELECT EP.name AS producer_name, EC.name AS consumer_name, ET.energy_amount FROM energy_transactions ET JOIN energy_producers EP ON ET.producer_id = EP.id JOIN energy_consumers EC ON ET.consumer_id = EC.id;
SELECT * FROM energy_producers;
SELECT producer_name, location FROM energy_producers ORDER BY producer_name ASC;
SELECT producer_name, location, production_capacity FROM energy_producers WHERE production_capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT transaction_date, energy_units FROM energy_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_producers;
SELECT producer_name, location FROM energy_producers ORDER BY producer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumers WHERE energy_consumed > 1000 ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT producer_name, energy_consumed FROM energy_producers INNER JOIN energy_consumers ON energy_producers.producer_id = energy_consumers.consumer_id;

SELECT producer_name, SUM(energy_units) AS total_energy_units FROM energy_producers INNER JOIN energy_transactions ON energy_producers.producer_id = energy_transactions.producer_id GROUP BY producer_name HAVING total_energy_units > 5000;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumers;
SELECT consumer_name, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumers ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT consumer_id, consumer_name, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumers WHERE energy_consumed > 1000;
SELECT producer_name, energy_produced FROM EnergyProducers WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EnergyTransactions WHERE energy_transferred BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumers WHERE consumer_id = 10 ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT consumer_name, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumers WHERE energy_consumed > 10000;
SELECT producer_name, energy_produced, timestamp FROM EnergyProducers WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY energy_produced ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyTransactions WHERE energy_transferred BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT block_id, previous_block_id, timestamp FROM EnergyBlockchain WHERE hash = '0x2f3bc705aa7e8f5876d89636f25090f99899c5b52ea604fe032c060df321ecf2';
